item.description:
Colchester Continental Fife & Drum Corps will host its annual 'Muster on the Green'.

Seven fife & Drum corps from around connecticut will join in the event, which kicks off at noon with a parade on Norwich ave beginning at Town Hall and ending at the Green. Opening ceremonies and Muster will follow.

At a fife & drum muster, each corps marches onto the muster field. plays a selection of tunes (usually a five minute medley) and marches off.

When all corps have performed, it is customary for members from each corps to amass for "Jollification" - playing of common fife & drum tunes of yesteryear.

All are welcome. Bring a lawn chair and enjoy the different corps attending this years' parade and muster. The Colchester Historical Society annual craft fair will take place on the green the same day.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Don and maybe his Tall Dog, MAX
item.name: Fife and Drum Muster
